statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT wallet_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE currency = 'EUR' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, currency, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT wallet_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY wallet_address HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY wallet_address;
SELECT timestamp, currency, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE currency IN ('USD', 'EUR') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, transaction_date, coin_symbol, amount, transaction_type FROM transaction_history WHERE coin_symbol = 'BTC';
SELECT coin_symbol, amount, transaction_date, transaction_type, id FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE owner_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, wallet_address, last_accessed FROM wallet_addresses WHERE last_accessed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, wallet_address, created_at FROM wallet_addresses WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, amount, coin_symbol FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type='Buy' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, coin_symbol, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT wallet_address, owner_name, created_at FROM wallet_addresses ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY last_accessed DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT user_id, currency, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE currency='USD';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT market_prices.timestamp, market_prices.currency, market_prices.price, wallet_addresses.balance FROM market_prices JOIN wallet_addresses ON market_prices.currency = wallet_addresses.currency;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, currency, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT address_id, user_id, address, balance FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM market_prices WHERE currency IN ('BTC', 'ETH', 'LTC') ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, currency, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE coin_symbol = 'BTC';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT coin_symbol, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY coin_symbol HAVING AVG(amount) > 5000;
SELECT th.transaction_id, wa.owner_name FROM transaction_history th INNER JOIN wallet_addresses wa ON th.from_wallet_address = wa.address;
SELECT mp.price_date, mp.coin_symbol, tp.price FROM market_prices mp INNER JOIN transaction_history th ON mp.coin_symbol = th.coin_symbol;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE coin_symbol = 'BTC';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_date, wp.price FROM transaction_history th JOIN market_prices wp ON th.coin_symbol = wp.coin_symbol WHERE th.transaction_id = 100;
SELECT wa.owner_name, th.amount FROM wallet_addresses wa JOIN transaction_history th ON wa.address = th.to_wallet_address WHERE th.amount < 0 ORDER BY th.amount ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT coin_symbol FROM market_prices ORDER BY coin_symbol;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT date, amount, currency FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT owner, account_balance FROM wallet_addresses WHERE account_balance < 5000;
SELECT currency, price FROM market_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT address, owner, account_balance FROM wallet_addresses WHERE owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_invested FROM investments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_invested DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM market_prices GROUP BY currency HAVING max_price > 1000;
